definition: to beat/to hit/variant of 考[kao3]/to inspect/to test/to take an exam
to check/to verify/to test/to examine/to take an exam/to take an entrance exam for/deceased father
according to/to act in accordance with/to depend on/to seize/to occupy

sentences.english: The textology of the Qing Dynasty is an old subject in the academic circle.
sentences.chinese: 清代考据学是学术界多次探讨的老问题。

sentences.english: Dai Zhen was a unique scholar during the Qian- Jia time, who was expert at textual research and argumentation.
sentences.chinese: 戴震兼擅义理与考据，在乾嘉学术史上独树一帜。

sentences.english: During the Ch'ing dynasty k'ao-cheng scholars advocated a program to reconstruct missing sources from antiquity.
sentences.chinese: 在清代，考据学者倡导重建古代佚散文献的计划。

definition: to do textual research/to make textual criticism/to verify by means of research (esp. historical details)/to take an exam to get a certificate (abbr. for 考取證件|考取证件[kao3 qu3 zheng4 jian4])
to interpret and make glossaries and commentaries on classic texts
to make far-fetched claims (idiom)/to offer outlandish explanations
to compose (a piece of writing)/to write/(written) work/writer
